description:
ATTENTION!

Our Firm Currently has a Search Assignment for a:

VICE PRESIDENT SALES

Plumbing / Consumer Products

JO#-0601Q

CLIENT: An established (over 60 years) Importer and Distributor of a variety of Finished and Rough, Carded and Bulk Plumbing, Kitchen and Bath Products. Company is currently generating Sales of nearly $70 million with Products sold throughout the U.S. to Major National Retailers, 2–Step Distributors, and Regional Chains in the Industry, boasting respected Clientele like Home Depot, ACE, Menards, Wal-Mart, K-Mart, Sears, etc. Our Client enjoys a Customer Base that includes virtually every well-known Retailer and Distributor in the Home Improvement/Hardware Industry and supports its position through Facilities exceeding 300,000 Sq. Ft. in multiple locations in the U.S. and China.

LOCATION: Chicago vicinity.

RESPONSIBILITIES: Reporting directly to the Chief Executive Officer, this position involves multiple responsibilities relative to the overall Sales and Marketing efforts of the Company including: Managing the Sales and Sales Support of Product Lines to National Accounts, Distributors, and Retail Channels of Trade. Additional responsibilities include Design and Implementation of Short and Long Term Sales and Strategies, Competitor and Market Analysis, Developing Brand presence and awareness within preferred Channels of Distribution. Establishing Sales Objectives and Orchestrating overall Sales effort. Work directly with other Internal Departments to Formulate, Develop, and provide support on Company Policies and Procedures that affect the Field Sales Organization and Customers. Other duties include: Development of the Annual Business Plan including Revenue, Income and Expense targets. Product Selections, Development and Production of Print Support such as Catalogs, Literature, Marketing Plans, Budgets, Forecasting, Studies, Pricing, Financial review of Accounts and Profit Margins making necessary changes to improve overall Company growth and positioning. Travel estimated at 30%-50%.

PERSONALITY: Successful individual will be a self-starter, “team player” with a commitment to excellence. Able to prioritize multiple tasks. This person should be creative and skilled at gathering and analyzing information from multiple sources, and at researching options and alternative solutions to problems. Must possess strong oral and written communication skills, along with excellent listening ability. A strong leader, passion for the business with a pulse on the Industry regarding trends, changes and ideas.

EXPERIENCE: Candidate will possess a BA or BS in Business, Management or related field. MBA a plus with a minimum of (5) five years Sales / Sales Management experience in Consumer Products with at least (3) three years experience Managing Large National Accounts. Individual will have successful Sales skills and Merchandising background possessing previous knowledge and contacts with the above Channels and Markets holding a track record of successfully leading a Team through the Sales process from Conception to Merchandising at Retail Level for End User application. Knowledge of Asian environment important. Solid general Math Skills required for Business Analysis, Promotional Planning, and Profitability Analysis. Must have Microsoft Office skills including Excel.

COMPENSATION: Target Base Salary will be Commensurate with experience plus Bonus, supported by Health, Medical, Dental, Life, Disability Insurance, 401K, Profit Sharing, Paid Holidays and Vacation and Relocation Assistance.

TIMING: We are currently in the Candidate Selection Process.

Our Client has Retained us to fill this position. All Candidates will only be processed through Prestige.

If you know of someone qualified for this position, please contact us in confidence, referring to JO#-0601Q.

This information is being sent to you because of your position,

responsibilities and Industry contacts as a networking source.

James A. Sammons / Brenda Schultz / Justin Johnson

PRESTIGE, INC.

Office: 608-524-4032

Email: prestige@prestige-inc.com

PH: (608) 524-4032 P.O. Box 421 • Reedsburg, WI 53959-0421 FAX: (608) 524-8577

Correspondent Offices: Chicago, IL - Minneapolis, MN - New York, NY
